titles.title: To extend until December 31, 1998, the temporary suspension of duties on 2,6-Dichlorobenzonitrile, relating to mixtures and inerts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 8/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1998, the suspension of duty on 2-6-dichlorobenzonitrile relating to mixtures and inerts.
